verses.content: Chuongchun, thiempu lal Eliasib chu a unau thiempuhai le chun an tho a, Berâm kawtkhâr chu an siem a; an sukthieng a, kawtkhârhai chu an siem a; Hammea in insâng chenin an sukthieng a, Hananel in insâng chen chun.
A dawta chun Jeriko mihaiin an siem a. Anni dawta chun Imri naupa Zakkur chun a siem a.
Chun, Nga kawtkhâr chu Has- sena naupahaiin an siem a; a kalhai an sieh a, a kawtkhâr kalhai an siem a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai dâm an siem a.
Anni dawta chun Hakkoz nau Uria naupa Meremoth chun a siem a. Anni dawta chun Mesezabel nau Berekia naupa Mesullam chun a siem ṭha a. Anni dawta chun Baana naupa Zadokin a siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Tekoa-haiin an siem ṭha a; nisienlakhawm, an mi lienhai chun an hotu sina chun an rîng an va rawl nuom ve nawh a.
Chun, kawtkhâr hlui chu Pasea naupa Joiada le Besodeia naupa Mesullam chun an siem ṭha a, a kalhai an khang a, a kawtkhâr chu an inkal a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu an rem a.
Chun, anni dawta Gibeon mi Melatia le Meronoth mi Jadon, vadung râl awptu thu hnuoia um Gibeon mihai le Mizpa mihai le chun an siem ṭha a.

A dawta chun rângkachak suttu- hai laia mi Harhaia naupa Uzziel chun a siem ṭha a. Chun, a dawt nâwka chun riminhnik siemtu laia mi Hanania chun a siem ṭha a; a kul sâna lai chenin Jerusalem chu an siem ṭha a.
Chun, anni dawta chun Jerusa- lem biel chenve hotu Hur naupa Rephaia chun a siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Harumaph naupa Jedaia chun a in zâwn chu a siem ṭha a. A dawta chun Hasabneia naupa Hattus chun a siem ṭha a.
Harim naupa Malkija le Pahath-Moab naupa Hassub hai chun meipui sepna in insâng le hmun dang an siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Jerusalem biel chenve hotu Hallohes naupa Sallum chun a naunuhmeihai leh an siem ṭha a.

Ruom kawtkhâr chu Hanun le Zanoa umhai chun an siem ṭha a; an siem a, a kawtkhârhai chu an inkal a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu an rem a; chun, Hmunhnawk kawtkhâr chenin kul tawng sâng khat an siem bawk a.
Hmunhnawk kawtkhâr ruok chu Beth-Hakerem biel hotu Rekab naupa Malkija chun a siem ṭha a; a siem a, kawtkhârhai chu a rem a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu a siem ṭha a.

Chun, Mizpa biel hotu Kolhoze naupa Sallum chun tuikhur kawt- khâr chu a siem ṭha a; a siem a, ân khum a, a kawtkhârhai a rem a, a kalnahai le a bâtnahai chu a rem a; chun, lal huon kâwla Sela dîl inhuon- na chu David khuoa inthawka fe thla kaiṭen chen khan a siem ṭha bawk a.
A dawta chun Azbuk, Beth-zur biel chenve hotu naupa Nehemia chun David thlân zâwn le dîl tieng le mi huoisenhai in chenin a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Levihaiin an siem ṭha a. Bani naupa Rehum hai rawi chun. A dawta chun Keila biel chenve hotu Hasabia chun ama biel hmingin a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun an unauhaiin an siem ṭha a; Keila biel chenve hotu Henadad naupa Bavvai rawiin an siem ṭha a.
Chun, a dawta chun Mizpa hotu Jesua naupa Ezer chun hmun dang, kul kâwi ṭannaa râlthuom siena hang panna zâwn chu a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Zabbai naupa Baruk chun ṭhahnemngaitakin hmun dang, kul kâwi ṭannaa inthawka thiempu lal Eliasib in kawtkhâr chenin a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Hakkoz naupa Uria naupa Meremoth chun hmun dang, Eliasib in kawtkhâra inthawk- a Eliasib in tâwp chenin a siem ṭha a.
Chun, a dawta chun chulai vêla thiempuhai chun an siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Benjamin le Hassub chun anni in zâwn chu an siem ṭha a. Anni dawta chun Anania nau Maaseia naupa Azaria chun ama in kâwl chu a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Henadad naupa Binnui chun hmun dang, Azaria ina inthawka kul kâwi ṭanna a kil chenin a siem ṭha a.
Uzai naupa Palal chun kul kâwi ṭanna zâwn le intângna in kâwl, lal in chunghnung lema inthawka va lawr in insâng zâwn a siem ṭha a. A dawta chun Paros naupa Pedaia chun a siem ṭha a.
Nethinimhai Ophela umhai chun saktieng panga Tui kawtkhâr zâwn chen le, in insâng va lawr chen khan an siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Teko-haiin hmun dang, in insâng lientak va lawr zâwn le Ophel kul chenin an siem ṭha a.
Sakawr kawtkhâr chung tieng thiempuhaiin mâni in zâwn seng an siem ṭha a.
Anni dawta chun Immer naupa Zadok chun ama in zâwn a siem ṭha a. Chun, a dawta chun saktieng kawt- khâr vêngtu Sekania naupa Semaia chun a siem ṭha a.
A dawta chun Selemia naupa Hanania le Zalaph naupa parukna Hanun chun hmun dang an siem ṭhah a. A dawta chun Berekia naupa Mesullam chun a umna zâwn a siem ṭhah a.
A dawta chun rângkachak suttu laia mi Malkija chun Hamiphkad kawtkhâr zâwn Nethinimhai in le sumdâwnghai in chen le, a kil hang panna chen khan a siem ṭhah a.
Chun, a kil hang panna le berâm kawtkhâr inkâr chu rângka- chak suttuhai le sumdâwngtuhai chun an siem ṭhah a.
